title: Language Learning Enhancement Program Using Pre-Training Interventions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of learning strategies
context.additional_context: Learners are at intermediate language proficiency, preparing for employment while participating in real-time online classes. They study on personal devices and receive continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Students can enhance language learning efficiency by over 30% within three months using pre-training intervention strategies.
Students can understand over 90% of key learning content by applying attentional advice and goal orientation.
Students can achieve over 80% improvement in cognitive and functional language proficiency through weekly formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
